item.description:
The April Meetup will be at the Worcester Art Museum. Included are works by Winslow Homer, Monet, Rembrandt and Sargent as well as silver items created by Paul Revere, ancient sculpture and contemporary art. Admission is free before 12 noon on Saturdays. We can have lunch at the museum and even eat outside and talk travel if the weather is nice. There will be a carpool leaving from Nashua NH around 10AM for anyone interested.

A friend of one of our members will be performing at Michael Timothy's Jazz Bar that evening on Main Street in Nashua NH. Our meetup can continue with dinner and listening to music......

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Worcester Art Museum
